tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The overall experience with the doctor was nice. Doctor is friendly and very cooperative and explain all the things very calmly. I recommend this doctor to my friends and colleague

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is highly experienced. I along with my family members are visiting him for last 20 years for his medical advice and treatment.  He takes time to listen and time to explain and with his investigative mind, experience and treatment the patient comes to know where he stands and what next steps look like. HIGHLY Recommended.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am feeling better after meeting with doctor and doctor advice are good for my health doctor is very friendly with us

tags: None
review:
The experience on the day of appointment with Doctor was very good and its still under process. I did not experience much waiting in his clinic, which usually happens with other doctors. I was suffering with diabetes from many days. Doctor is very communicative to discuss about your issues and guides the patients with lot of patience. Very friendly enough to speak to him about he problems.

As sugar does not have permanent cure, i am still under follow up treatment with the doctor. I visit the doctor on regular basis as per doctor suggestions. Availability of doctor is also very good, available at maximum times. Happy for the same. The treatment is going on very well with the best co operation from Doctor.

The infrastructure in the clinic is also really great. Also the clinic and the waiting area and the consultation rooms are maintained very well with all necessary facilities for the patients to have a pleasant experience in the clinic. The well mannered staff are a added advantage in the clinic. A recommendable doctor for all needy persons.
